metadata.inclusion:
Ensure the door lock is open.
1. Open the battery cover of the indoor unit and press the [REG] button.
2. Press the [#] button, then enter the Master PIN: [1][2][3][4] (default value).
3. Press the [*] button, then press [8][8].
metadata.exclusion:
Ensure the door lock is open.
1. Open the battery cover of the indoor unit and press the [REG] button.
2. Press the [#] button, then enter the Master PIN: [1][2][3][4] (default value).
3. Press the [*] button, then press [9][9].
metadata.reset:
Ensure the door lock is open.
1. Open the battery cover of the indoor unit and press the [REG] button.
2. Press the [#] button, then enter the Master PIN: [1][2][3][4] (default value).
3. Press the [*] button, then press [5].
4. Press the [*] button, then press [2].
5. Press the [#] button, then enter the Master PIN: [1][2][3][4] (default value).
